LanguageData.VMM_MeleeParryChance.label: Melee Parry Chance
LanguageData.VMM_MeleeParryChance.description: Chance to parry incoming melee attacks.
LanguageData.VMM_MeleeParryDamageReduction.label: Melee Parry Damage Reduction
LanguageData.VMM_MeleeParryDamageReduction.descriptio: Fraction of damage reduced when a parry is successful.
LanguageData.VMM_MeleeCounterChance.label: Melee Counter Chance
LanguageData.VMM_MeleeCounterChance.description: Chance to immediately counter-attack after a successful parry.
